name: Grim Dawn

files.game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.

task.app: vcrun2010 vcrun2012 vcrun2013 vcrun2015 d3dcompiler_43 d3dcompiler_47 win7
task.name: winetricks

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Grim Dawn/Grim Dawn.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    app: vcrun2010 vcrun2012 vcrun2013 vcrun2015 d3dcompiler_43 d3dcompiler_47 win7
    description: Installing dependencies
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing Grim Dawn
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
